title: Spacious Umalas One- and Two-Bedroom Pool Villas with Massages, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Surrounded by emerald rice fields and the peaceful ambiance of Umalas, The Bidadari Villas & Spa offers a secluded retreat amid Bali's lush landscape. Kitted out with a private garden and gleaming pool, you may find it hard to leave the comfort of your own tropical hideaway.

Should you manage to peel yourself away, head straight to The Yubi Spa for elevated relaxation, savour comforting meals at the two-storey restaurant. Beyond the resort, be sure to explore the nearby beaches, such as the famous Echo and Canggu Beach, known for their laid-back surf culture, or stop by beach clubs like Potato Head and Finns Beach Club. You’ll also find restaurants and cafes within walking distance in Umalas.
offer_address: Jalan Bumbak 27, Banjar Anyar Kelod Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Balinese Private Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Dining
description: Following in the footsteps of its popular sister property in Seminyak, Maca Villas & Spa Umalas welcomes you to enjoy a truly relaxing Balinese getaway. Ideally located between Seminyak and Canggu, these chic private pool villas are perfectly placed for you to make the most of the island’s best beaches, shopping and nightlife. This blissful Bali escape includes daily breakfast and afternoon tea, three three-course dinners, one daily 30-minute massage per person, a daily cocktail each and return airport transfers.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung Gang Panilla, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Bali Private Pool Villa with Daily Dining, Nightly Cocktails & One Child Stays Free
description:
Enjoy the serenity of Bali’s Umalas region from the tranquil Maca Villas & Spa Umalas. Conveniently located between happening Canggu and bustling Seminyak, the hotel is set among tropical landscaped gardens with masterfully designed private pool villas that blend traditional Balinese touches with contemporary modern stylings. Savour this laidback region at its most extraordinary - begin each morning on the famed surf breaks of Canggu before returning for a sumptuous breakfast, indulge in holistic wellness treatments at the nearby spa and venture to bustling Seminyak as night falls.

Maca Villas & Spa Umalas is an idyllic base for exploring one of Bali's hidden gems, offering a charming mix of rice fields, boutique cafes and simple charm. Visit sacred temples at the Ubud Monkey Forest, bar-hop at the likes of Mrs Sippy Bali and Potato Head Beach Club or enjoy the beauty of Canggu Beach, before returning to the luxe privacy of your secluded pool villa.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung Gang Panilla, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Boutique Bali Private Pool Villa Luxury with Massages, Nightly Cocktails & Daily Breakfast
description:

Savour this laidback region at its most extraordinary - begin each morning on the famed surf breaks of Canggu before returning for a sumptuous breakfast, indulge in holistic wellness treatments at the onsite spa and venture to bustling Seminyak as night falls.

Maca Villas & Spa Umalas is an idyllic base for exploring one of Bali's hidden gems, offering a charming mix of rice fields, boutique cafes and simple charm. Find yourself within close reach of sacred temples at the Ubud Monkey Forest, bar-hopping at the likes of Mrs Sippy Bali and Potato Head Beach Club or the beauty of Tanah Lot Temple and Canggu Beach, allowing you to explore Bali's best before returning to the luxe privacy of your secluded pool villa.
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung Gang Panilla, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Private Villa Escape Near Seminyak
description: Indulge in a romantic, villa-only getaway at Maca Villas & Spa Umalas. This tropical sanctuary provides guests with high-end service in luxurious private pool villas. Indulge in daily breakfast, three multi-course dinners, evening cocktails, private return airport transfers, two daily 30-minute massages to share and more.
location_description: Maca Villas and Spa Umalas OLD*
offer_address: Jalan Umalas Klecung, Kerobokan Kelod, Kuta Utara, Kerobokan Kelod, Badung, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Pool Villa Escape near Seminyak with Daily Dining & Cocktails
description:
Escape to Bali in style with a private pool villa stay at Alam Boutique Resort, conveniently located between Seminyak and Canggu. Discover a dreamy island paradise within your own private pool villa, where traditional Balinese design gives an authentic village feel, while fresh contemporary touches make your stay ultra-comfortable. Featuring an exquisite restaurant serving local and international dishes - as well as Bali's trademark warm hospitality - Alam Boutique Resort is the place to escape to when you want a healthy dose of tranquility.

With a perfect blend of beachfront beauty, boutique shops, decadent dining venues, chic bars and vibrant nightlife, nearby Seminyak is one of Bali's most popular holiday hot spots. Stay just a 15-minute drive from the action, with the option of relaxing by your private pool whenever you want. Drive 20 minutes in the opposite direction and you'll find Canggu, renowned for being one of Bali's best surf spots.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Get your day off to a good start with delicious daily à la carte breakfast in-villa or at Tuk Tuk restaurant
- Enjoy daily two-course lunch or dinner at Tuk Tuk Bali Restaurant
- Celebrate your island escape with a daily cocktail per adult
- Ask the hotel about late checkout, subject to availability
- One child (aged 9 and under) stays free with breakfast

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to the two-bedroom villa for four (plus two children aged 9 and under stay free with breakfast) or the three-bedroom villa for six (plus three children aged 9 and under stay free with breakfast).
offer_address: Umalas, Seminyak, Jl. Bumbak Dauh No.88, Kerobokan, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Relax in Your Own Tropical Retreat with Daily Meals, Massages and More Included
description: Swap city life for barefoot bliss in your own private pool villa at Uppala Villa & Spa Umalas, nestled in a serene location between Seminyak and Canggu. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, your choice of a two-course lunch or three-course dinner daily, a daily cocktail each, a relaxing 60-minute Balinese massage each, return airport transfers and handy late checkout at 1pm.
offer_address: Jl. Bumbak Dauh, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Pool Villa Luxury with Daily Dining & Café del Mar Beach Club Access
description:
Swap city life for sea, sand and barefoot luxury with a private pool villa stay at Uppala Villa & Spa Umalas, perfectly perched between the beach club nirvana of Seminyak and the more serene, slower-paced Canggu. From the moment you’re picked up at the airport, the indulgence begins with return transfers, daily buffet breakfast, your choice of daily two-course lunch or three-course dinner, one daily cocktail per adult, a one-time 60-minute massage per adult and guaranteed 1pm late checkout.

The luxury reaches new heights with complimentary access to Canggu’s Café del Mar beach club, featuring complimentary sun lounger and day bed usage and towel service (prior to 1pm), with complimentary return shuttle transfers.

Plus, two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free with daily breakfast and return airport transfers.

**Travelling as a group?** Two and Three-Bedroom Villa Upgrades are available.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Jl. Bumbak Dauh, Kerobokan, Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
